articles.title: Boeing agrees to buy fuselage maker Spirit AeroSystems in $4.7 billion deal - CNBC
articles.description: Boeing is buying the supplier of fuselages as it looks for a way out of its manufacturing and safety crisis.
articles.content:
Boeing said Monday that it will buy back its struggling fuselage maker Spirit AeroSystems in an all-stock deal that the planemaker has said will improve safety and quality control.

articles.title: BlackRock Buys Preqin for $3.2 Billion in Private Data Expansion - Bloomberg
